name: ugli
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
a brand name for a type of fruit that is a mixture of a tangerine and a grapefruit: Remove the peel and halve the Ugli. Ugli fruit are pretty widely available nowadays. Ugli is good for your health and may help protect you from heart disease.
More examplesFewer examplesThe Ugli is grown in Jamaica and has a thick yellow-green skin. Wild cherries and Uglis were growing everywhere.Have you seen UGLI fruit in the fruit and vegetable section at your local supermarket?Ugli fruit is an excellent source of vitamin C.The juice of the Ugli has been popular here for many years.
